text: Is there any difference between sandbox and normal account? I’m working on an integration for a client which will kickstart the whole HubSpot environment for them. So I was thinking I would start by configuring a sandbox and eventually just turning it into their actual account. I guess my question is: Am I doing something wrong here? :smile:
As far as I’m aware, no you cannot do this.
Ok so account side does have some limitations then?
Quite the opposite - the developer accounts are completely open functionality wise, but I believe they just cannot be upgraded to be a live account. I could be wrong though.
